docs.text: Data Layer Raw low-level binary codes that contains information after analysis. Knowledge Layer Connected information. Knowledge Triangle A stack of three layers. At the base is the Data Layer , above that the Information Layer and at the top the Knowledge Layer . Information Layer Data about our key business entities. This includes Things, like People, Places and Events.
